description: Non-Material Amendment application to planning permission reference 73955/APP/2022/2613, dated 20-03-2023 to amend the wording of Condition 30 (Wind Protection Measures) of the approved permission.
decision_conditions: Condition 30 of planning permission 73955/APP/2022/2613 is amended to:

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the wind protection measures and details contained within the 'Pedestrian Level Wind Micro Climate Assessment - Technical Memorandum' (Ref. 2410325 - Rev C) (dated 21/02/2025), prepared by RWDI.
Reason: To safeguard the amenity of the occupants of the proposed development in accordance with policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 30, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 73955/APP/2022/2613 dated 20-03-23, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
